briefTitle: Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' DTPa-IPV/Hib (Infanrix™-IPV/Hib)
officialTitle: Safety and Reactogenicity of GSK Biologicals' DTPa-IPV/Hib (Infanrix™-IPV/Hib) in Infants
summary: This study will evaluate the safety and reactogenicity of Infanrix-IPV/Hib given as a three-dose primary vaccination course to healthy infants at 2-3-4 or 3-4-5 months of age.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Any Solicited Local Symptoms
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: During the 4-day (Days 0-3) follow-up period after each dose and across doses
